wikipedia_page.main: General Sir Edward Selby Smyth,  (31 March 1819 –  22 September 1896) was a British General. He served as the first General Officer Commanding the Militia of Canada from 1874 to 1880.

response: *22 September – Edward Selby Smyth, British General, commanded Militia of Canada from 1874 to 1880 (born 1819).
*1881–1893 (1st Battalion): Gen. Sir Edward Selby Smyth, KCMG (ex 72nd Foot)

response: *1881: Gen. Sir Edward Selby Smyth, KCMG
*31 March – Edward Selby Smyth, British General, commanded Militia of Canada from 1874 to 1880 (died 1896).
